body_html:
@rmlarsen Updated, thanks.

By the way, it would be really helpful if either non-admin contributors could ask Jenkins to test, or if CONTRIBUTING.md included instructions for how to run local tests to minimize CI failures (like buildifier and unit tests). That could really reduce the burden on admins to babysit minor mistakes like these.
body_text:

That could really reduce the burden on admins to babysit minor mistakes like these.
body:
@rmlarsen Updated, thanks.

By the way, it would be really helpful if either non-admin contributors could ask Jenkins to test, or if `CONTRIBUTING.md` included instructions for how to run local tests to minimize CI failures (like buildifier and unit tests). That could really reduce the burden on admins to babysit minor mistakes like these.
